member.name: VOLUME_DISK_EXTENTS
member.summary: Represents a physical location on a disk. It is the output buffer for theIOCTL_VOLUME_GET_VOLUME_DISK_EXTENTScontrol code.

summary.para: The number of disks in the volume (a volume can span multiple disks).

An extent is a contiguous run of sectors on one disk. When the number of extents returned is greater than one (1), the error code ERROR_MORE_DATA is returned. You should call again, allocating enough buffer space based on the value of NumberOfDiskExtents after the firstDeviceIoControl call.
